Ask HN: Solo Dev Stack of 2022?
text:
I am mostly interested in what ties together backend and frontend, the later necessarily including web + android/ios, in the most time effective way possible in 2022.

Things I am looking for: * The web/app one man show stack. What's the most reasonable way to get there, alone, assuming you start from scratch with now expectations about the tech you are going to use. * Flexibility and dev speed. I am looking for a stack that can work for websites and apps, on the web + android + ios (or any subset of those). The less redundancy and additional parts to learn to make it all work, the better.

Things I am willing to give up: * App speed, specially on the client side. Webviews are okay, if it allows for relatively easy app dev. * Matureness. I assume if something had already won in this space it would be apparent.
